Room.Name: Generic Clerical Supplies
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a large emporium of clerical goods and products.
Room.LongDescription: No cleric could go out adventuring without his or her trusty crucifix or a vial of holy water. A number of small potions and other clerical supplies line the shelves of the shop. A kindly old man waits behind the counter for you to place an order.
